channel.title: Gello on Cris Silva

item.title: How to Read
item.description: Paragraph Here’s how you get the best from your reading! Reading does have its place, but it is not the be-all and end-all. Reading can make you feel knowledgeable, it alone cannot make you competent in building or creating things like products, organisations, experiments, or even fixing your car. For thousands of years, humans learned by doing and imitating others. This neural circuitry still dominates every human being. Over time, our language and ability to read complex text has dramatically improved knowledge sharing across generations.
